column4: hello I am a newboob on the Ubuntu platform... I have my box set up and everything I am VNCing from my Windows XP desktop to the ubuntu box but the problem is when I restart the Ubuntu box and it askes me to login.. I can't VNC into the box
finally some one is reading my message
you may want to look into www.nomachine.com
no...nomachine is a seperate thing...something to consider. you could write a script that starts a vncserver session at boot
